original: tri ratna mangga la g'a th'a /
analyzed: tri ratna mangga la g'a th'a /

original: mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
analyzed: mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
translated: The Auspicious Verses of the Three Jewels

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: rgya mtsho lta bur brgal dka' 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal //
analyzed: rgya mtsho lta bur brgal dka' 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal //
translated: Having crossed over the swamp of sa·πÉsƒÅra, difficult to cross over like the ocean,

original: bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis bsags dka' ma lus rdzogs /
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis bsags dka' ma lus rdzogs /
translated: all the difficult accumulations of the two collections of merit and wisdom are perfected,

original: 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig gyur pa de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig gyur pa de bzhin gshegs //
translated: the TathƒÅgata, the sole friend of all beings,üîΩby that holy auspiciousness, may there be well-being here and now.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang der 'dir bde legs shog / rang don spangs shing gzhan don rtag tu lhur len cing //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang der 'dir bde legs shog / rang don spangs shing gzhan don rtag tu lhur len cing //
translated: Always forsaking one's own benefit and taking up the welfare of others,

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lta ba rgyang bsrings te //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lta ba rgyang bsrings te //
translated: looking from afar at the five sense pleasures,

original: dad dang brtson 'grus lhur len grags mchog byang chub sems //
analyzed: dad dang brtson 'grus lhur len grags mchog byang chub sems //
translated: the most famous bodhisattvas who take up faith and diligence,üîΩby that holy auspiciousness, may there be well-being here and now.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / skye 'gag med cing rtog pa'i 'ching byed mtha' dag spangs //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / skye 'gag med cing rtog pa'i 'ching byed mtha' dag spangs //
translated: Without arising or ceasing, having abandoned all the bonds of conceptualization,

original: ma rig mun pa 'joms byed stong nyid sgron ma'i mchog / dmigs pa sna tshogs spangs pa lam gyi bde sgrub chos //
analyzed: ma rig mun pa 'joms byed stong nyid sgron ma'i mchog / dmigs pa sna tshogs spangs pa lam gyi bde sgrub chos //
translated: The supreme lamp of emptiness, which destroys the darkness of ignorance, The Dharma, which is the attainment of the path's bliss, abandoning various objects of meditation,

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog //
translated: By that holy auspiciousness, may there be well-being here today.

original: dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The verses of auspiciousness of the Three Jewels are complete.
